name: War Plan Orange: Dreadnoughts in the Pacific 1922-1930
name_original: War Plan Orange: Dreadnoughts in the Pacific 1922-1930
description:
War Plan Orange: Dreadnoughts in the Pacific 1922-1930 is a strategy game developed by 2by3 Games. It was originally released in 2005. Matrix Games published the game.
War Plan Orange: Dreadnoughts in the Pacific 1922-1930 is available on PC.
